"nt;"" />  </p>  <p style=""clear:both;text-align:center;"">   用来支撑舞台的木头已经腐朽。  </p>  <p style=""clear:both;text-align:center;"">   <img src=""http://xinhuaapp-img.img.aliyuncs.com/caiyunnan/20151113/201511131054409377.jpg"" data-src=""https://mmbiz.qlogo.cn/mmbiz/CkPCq4jnrDaWzlnS7ic5DgaRQpHdvicEhicqsNU5uqpCTlo5BpK1FFGlHbZNf36PCUDcYFWzuY8xO3Bnt5WZ9SyTA/0?wx_fmt=jpeg"" data-w=""478"" data-ratio=""0.6673640167364017"" data-type=""jpeg"" source=""lib"" copyright_status=""0"" format=""jpeg"" file_id=""400332168"" url=""https://mmbiz.qlogo.cn/mmbiz/CkPCq4jnrDaWzlnS7ic5DgaRQpHdvicEhicqsNU5uqpCTlo5BpK1FFGlHbZNf36PCUDcYFWzuY8xO3Bnt5WZ9SyTA/0?wx_fmt=jpeg"" data-s=""300,640"" _src=""http://xinhuaapp-img.img.aliyuncs.com/caiyunnan/20151113/201511131054409377.jpg"" style=""max-width:100%;height:auto !important;width:auto !important;visibility:visible !important;"" />  </p>  <p style=""clear:both;text-align:center;"">   安全逃生门已经被堵塞。  </p>  <p style=""clear:both;text-align:center;"">   <img src=""http://xinhuaapp-img.img.aliyuncs.com/caiyunnan/20151113/201511131054407120.jpg"" data-src=""https://mmbiz.qlogo.cn/mmbiz/CkPCq4jnrDaWzlnS7ic5DgaRQpHdvicEhicYGUtQh2qaAD05LAdtzXQdPYmgSEdXNgVWl7AoNIGEicQ7nn53tOQLFg/0?wx_fmt=jpeg"" data-w=""478"" data-ratio=""0.6673640167364017"" data-type=""jpeg"" source=""lib"" copyright_status=""0"" format=""jpeg"" file_id=""400332162"" url=""https://mmbiz.qlogo.cn/mmbiz/CkPCq4jnrDaWzlnS7ic5DgaRQpHdvicEhicYGUtQh2qaAD05LAdtzXQdPYmgSEdXNgVWl7AoNIGEicQ7nn53tOQLFg/0?wx_fmt=jpeg"" data-s=""300,640"" _src=""http://xinhuaapp-img.img.aliyuncs.com/caiyunnan/20151113/201511131054407120.jpg"" style=""max-width:100%;height:auto !important;width:auto !important;visibility:visible !important;"" />  </p>  <p style=""clear:both;text-align:center;"">   舞台上的木质地板已经腐朽不堪。  </p>  <p style=""clear:both;text-align:center;"">   <img src=""http://xinhuaapp-img.img.aliyuncs.com/caiyunnan/20151113/201511131054419848.jpg"" data-src=""https://mmbiz.qlogo.cn/mmbiz/CkPCq4jnrDaWzlnS7ic5DgaRQpHdvicEhicjnichE0iaAq2Ale0KPHwwWPsEyMEDJ5LxLM7hnic7c5htNtibDNmOuVlaA/0?wx_fmt=jpeg"" data-w=""478"" data-ratio=""0.6673640167364017"" data-type=""jpeg"" source=""lib"" copyright_status=""0"" format=""jpeg"" file_id=""400332174"" url=""https://mmbiz.qlogo.cn/mmbiz/CkPCq4jnrDaWzlnS7ic5DgaRQpHdvicEhicjnichE0iaAq2Ale0KPHwwWPsEyMEDJ5LxLM7hnic7c5htNtibDNmOuVlaA/0?wx_fmt=jpeg"" data-s=""300,640"" _src=""http://xinhuaapp-img.img.aliyuncs.com/caiyunnan/20151113/201511131054419848.jpg"" style=""max-width:100%;height:auto !important;width:auto !important;visibility:visible !important;"" />  </p>  <p style=""clear:both;text-align:center;"">   这里就是当年土豪的视角，从包厢向荧幕方向看去。  </p>  <p style=""clear:both;text-align:center;"">   <img src=""http://xinhuaapp-img.img.aliyuncs.com/caiyunnan/20151113/201511131054411821.jpg"" data-src=""https://mmbiz.qlogo.cn/mmbiz/CkPCq4jnrDaWzlnS7ic5DgaRQpHdvicEhic6Bw5h5n1UGHlJ3mtzCPbEhBJaYOmTkX2OhHxBEZFCxeZeR4b7npibPQ/0?wx_fmt=jpeg"" data-w=""478"" data-ratio=""0.6673640167364017"" data-type=""jpeg"" source=""lib"" copyright_status=""0"" format=""jpeg"" file_id=""400332165"" url=""https://mmbiz.qlogo.cn/mmbiz/CkPCq4jnrDaWzlnS7ic5DgaRQpHdvicEhic6Bw5h5n1UGHlJ3mtzCPbEhBJaYOmTkX2OhHxBEZFCxeZeR4b7npibPQ/0?wx_fmt=jpeg"" data-s=""300,640"" _src=""http://xinhuaapp-img.img.aliyuncs.com/caiyunnan/20151113/201511131054411821.jpg"" style=""max-width:100%;height:auto !important;width:auto !important;visibility:visible !important;"" />  </p>  <p style=""clear:both;text-align:center;"">   已经被拆除的顶棚，天还是30年前的天，人已远去。  </p>  <p style=""clear:both;text-align:center;"">   <img src=""http://xinhuaapp-img.img.aliyuncs.com/caiyunnan/20151113/201511131054418562.jpg"" data-src=""https://mmbiz.qlogo.cn/mmbiz/CkPCq4jnrDaWzlnS7ic5DgaRQpHdvicEhicbPS6ibGlmIQoS3c3YhMGqFkCIPjDcyhu6YgNkuuWJZQUXmFtnr15Ifg/0?wx_fmt=jpeg"" data-w=""478"" data-ratio=""0.5627615062761506"" data-type=""jpeg"" source=""lib"" copyright_status=""0"" format=""jpeg"" file_id=""400332198"" url=""https://mmbiz.qlogo.cn/mmbiz/CkPCq4jnrDaWzlnS7ic5DgaRQpHdvicEhicbPS6ibGlmIQoS3c3YhMGqFkCIPjDcyhu6YgNkuuWJZQUXmFtnr15Ifg/0?wx_fmt=jpeg"" data-s=""300,640"" _src=""http://xinhuaapp-img.img.aliyuncs.com/caiyunnan/20151113/201511131054418562.jpg"" style=""max-width:100%;height:auto !important;width:auto !important;visibility:visible !important;"" />  </p>  <p style=""clear:both;text-align:center;"">   绿色的木门，只留下了也许痕迹。  </p>  <p style=""clear:both;text-align:center;"">   <img src=""http://xinhuaapp-img.img.aliyuncs.com/caiyunnan/20151113/201511131054413076.jpg"" data-src=""https://mmbiz.qlogo.cn/mmbiz/CkPCq4jnrDaWzlnS7ic5DgaRQpHdvicEhicAp9gYVSsqtgkcg9F5y4ib8UFNpxs2iaHOU8p4ewN7Eyg9rXTjVWx1zZg/0?wx_fmt=jpeg"" data-w=""478"" data-ratio=""0.6673640167364017"" data-type=""jpeg"" source=""lib"" copyright_status=""0"" format=""jpeg"" file_id=""400332171"" url=""https://mmbiz.qlogo.cn/mmbiz/CkPCq4jnrDaWzlnS7ic5DgaRQpHdvicEhicAp9gYVSsqtgkcg9F5y4ib8UFNpxs2iaHOU8p4ewN7Eyg9rXTjVWx1zZg/0?wx_fmt=jpeg"" data-s=""300,640"" _src=""http://xinhuaapp-img.img.aliyuncs.com/caiyunnan/20151113/201511131054413076.jpg"" style=""max-width:100%;height:auto !important;width:auto !important;visibility:visible !important;"" />  </p>  <p style=""clear:both;text-align:center;"">   残垣断壁  </p>  <p style=""clear:both;text-align:center;"">   <img src=""http://xinhuaapp-img.img.aliyuncs.com/caiyunnan/20151113/201511131054419818.jpg"" data-src=""https://mmbiz.qlogo.cn/mmbiz/CkPCq4jnrDaWzlnS7ic5DgaRQpHdvicEhiczO1SibH7P8gkwPhD8u89BxewtegVnKyOyxVgOZ2oF5whXItPvnQn4Rw/0?wx_fmt=jpeg"" data-w=""478"" data-ratio=""0.5627615062761506"" data-type=""jpeg"" source=""lib"" copyright_status=""0"" format=""jpeg"" file_id=""400332213"" url=""https://mmbiz.qlogo.cn/mmbiz/CkPCq4jnrDaWzlnS7ic5DgaRQpHdvicEhiczO1SibH7P8gkwPhD8u89BxewtegVnKyOyxVgOZ2oF5whXItPvnQn4Rw/0?wx_fmt=jpeg"" data-s=""300,640"" <p style=""clear:both;text-align:center;"">   如果你见过这种装饰品，说明你已经老了。  </p> </blockquote> <p style=""clear:both;font-family:sans-serif;font-size:16px;white-space:normal;line-height:1.75em;"">  <span style=""font-family:inherit;line-height:1.6em;"">编辑：李美兰</span><span style=""font-family:inherit;line-height:1.6em;""><br /> </span> </p> <p
